function.name: read
function.block: { char c, mi = 0; while(c = getchar(), c <= 32); if(c == '-') mi = 1, x = 0; else if(c < 48 || c > 57) return void(x = c); else x = c - 48; while(c = getchar(), c > 32) x = 10 * x + c - 48; if(mi == 1) x = -x; }

function.name: write
function.block: { static char s[20]; char pt = 0, mi = (x < 0); if(mi == 1) x = -x; while(!pt || x > 0) { s[++pt] = (char)(x % 10 + '0'); x /= 10; } if(mi == 1) putchar('-'); while(pt > 0) putchar(s[pt--]); }

function.name: writea
function.block: { for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) { write(a[i]); putchar(i + 1 == n ? '\n' : ' '); } }

function.name: gcd
function.block: { return b ? gcd(b, a % b) : a; }

function.name: qpom
function.block: { T r = 1; while(b > 0) { if(b & 1) r = r * a % mod; a = a * a % mod; b /= 2; } return r; }

function.name: qpow
function.block: { T r = 1; while(b > 0) { if(b & 1) r *= a; a *= a; b /= 2; } return r; }

function.name: push
split
merge
out
main
